mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.time AS "time", a.num AS "num", a.in_date AS "inDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT date(if(b.time is null,now(),b.time))as inDate, time_point as time,sum(if(num is null,0,num)) as num FROM time_point a LEFT JOIN TRAVEL_QPS_URL b ON a.sec=update_by AND create_date=date(now()) group by inDate,time_point union all SELECT date(if(b.time is null,adddate(now(),-1),b.time))as inDate, time_point as time,sum(if(num is null,0,num)) as num FROM time_point a LEFT JOIN TRAVEL_QPS_URL b ON a.sec=update_by AND create_date=date(adddate(now(),-1)) group by inDate,time_point

SELECT request_url,sum(num) as num FROM TRAVEL_QPS_URL WHERE FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time)/300)=FLOOR((UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2015-07-07 08:10:10')-300)/300) GROUP BY request_url ORDER BY SUM(num) desc limit 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONCURRENCE( id, time, num, in_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{time}, #{num}, #{inDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CONCURRENCE SET time = #{time}, num = #{num}, in_date = #{inDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
